info.title: EverydayCare API Documentation
info.description: Documentation follows the order of: Jing Yin, Xuan Tong, Asyira, Sandi, and Yiru. Each section contains endpoints related to the respective team member's features.

tags.name: Places
tags.description: Endpoints related to places, locations, and points of interest

tags.name: PlaceNotes
tags.description: Place notes creation, retrieval, editing, and deletion endpoints

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: Signup, login, forgot password, and reset password endpoints ( Mailgun and reCAPTCHA integration)

tags.name: HelpRequests
tags.description: Emergency help request creation, cancellation, and completion endpoints

tags.name: EmergencyContacts
tags.description: Create, edit, and delete emergency contact endpoints

tags.name: EmergencyHotlines
tags.description: View and call emergency hotline numbers and SOS endpoints
